remarks: A division ring's unit is the identity element of its multiplicative group.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2011.)
statement:
drngid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
drngid.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
drngid.u $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
drngid.g $e |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( B \ { .0. } ) ) $.
drngid $p |- ( R e. DivRing -> .1. = ( 0g ` G ) ) $.
